name: Ensure READ ONLY Table is not used
description: This rule checks if any READ ONLY table exists in Oracle Database(s).
output:
Associated to each violation, the following information is provided:
- The number of violation occurrences
- Bookmarks for violation occurrences found in the source code
rationale: READ ONLY mode for Table is not supported by PostgreSQL.
remediation:
PostgreSQL does not provide an equivalent to the READ ONLY mode supported in Oracle.
The following alternatives could be used as workarounds:
l “Read-only” User or Role.
l “Read-only” database.
l Creating a “read-only” database trigger or a using a “read-only” constraint.
remediationSample: Remove ALTER TABLE ... READ ONLY statements.
alternativeName: Ensure READ ONLY Table is not used

technicalCriteria.name: Database Migration - Oracle Database to PostgreSQL
